Travel Buddy

Go Beyond Gives Choices To You!

Do you want to plan your own holiday, but need a bit of help during your trip? Go Beyond Holidays can provide you with a ‘Travel Buddy’ who will join you on your holiday and give you just the right amount of support.

With our 'Travel Buddy' holidays, you choose when and where you wish to go. Your friends can come too if you wish. It’s up to you!

We can help with every aspect of your holiday.

What type of holiday would you like? Beach holiday? Sight seeing? Touring holiday? Adventure holiday? We can give you as much advice as you need.

Who do you want on your holiday? Just you? You and a friend or group of friends? With a group you have never met before? Let us know, and we’ll come up with a plan.

We can help to pick your dates, help you to decide the best time to go.

And we can help you choose your accommodation: hotel, hostel, campsite or guesthouse.

We can help with ideas of how best to spend your time on your holiday. Walking in the hills or sight seeing, shopping or relaxing on the beach.

Let us book your travel arrangements. By aeroplane, coach, train, boat or all of these? We can help you decide.

And of course, we’ll provide a travel buddy to help you every step of the way. If you wish, your Travel Buddy can support you from the departing station or airport or they can even accompany you from your front door all the way to your destination. They can support you throughout your holiday, with all of the things that you decide to do. Then your Buddy will support you back home to your door. You can choose.

If you’d like to find out more, please get in touch.
